title: De impia quorundam in scholis docentium eruditione
creator: Meier, Gerhardus
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Meier, Gerhardus: De impia quorundam in scholis docentium eruditione  breviter atque strictim exponebat, orationi solenni, arctissimum studii sapientiæ ... Vir præcellens, clarissimus atque doctissimus, Dn. Fridericus Albertus Enckelmann, ad proximum Veneris diem ... præfaturus Gerh. Meier, D. Theol., Pastor ad ædem Cathedr. Primarius, Superintendens, Scholarcha & in sacris Consiliarius. Bremae  Berlin 1719
